author: USA TODAY, Mark Medina, USA TODAY
title: Former NBA player Jeremy Lin on if Chinese Basketball Association will resume season: 'We're kind of in limbo'
description: Former NBA player Jeremy Lin has spent the last two weeks in Beijing living with uncertainty. He has no idea if the CBA will resume play.
content:
Sports Pulse: Easy exercises for when you dont feel like working out
USA TODAY
At least Jeremy Lin can train. He no longer has to remain in self-quarantine.
